ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and grains on leafy stems and fragrant herbs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Grain with husk, and fragrant grasses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and a variety of corn with both husk and grain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: grain with its husk and aromatic herbs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And grain covered with husk, and fragrant flowers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And also corn, with (its) `Asf, and Rayhan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the grain with (its) husk and fragrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and grain in the blade, and fragrant herbs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and grains with their husk and fragrant plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And grain chaffed and other food.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: grain with husk, and fragrant herbs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Also corn, with (its) leaves and stalk for fodder, and sweet-smelling plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And also corn, with (its) leaves and stalk for fodder, and sweet-scented plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the grain in the blade; and aromatic herbs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And grains in the blades, and fragrant plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And grain having husks and scented plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:12] and grain, such as wheat and barley, with husk, and fragrant herb.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Husked grain) all kind of grain (and scented herb) spikes of grain and fruits.
